name: Transmission Pending
description:
Multiplayer game in which you see through sound. Join an arena and carefully track down your enemies. Position yourself, set ambushes, and await the impending fight.

Singleplayer Instructions:

  • Unzip TransmissionPending.zip and run nordic-game-jam-21.exe
  • Select Host on the main menu

Multiplayer Instructions:

  • To host a game open port 7777.
  • Unzip TransmissionPending.zip and run nordic-game-jam-21.exe
  • Select host if you want to host a game 
  • To join an existing game enter the IP in the field on the main menu and click join.

Controls

  • Movement - wasd
  • Jump - space
  • Shoot - left mouse button
  • Respawn - space
